pages.text: $(li)The Impaling enchantment can be applied in a Trident.$(br)$(li)This enchantment increases the damage inflicted to any creature with the enchanted Trident.
pages.title: Impaling

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level V.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level VI of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Impaling).
